newsitem.title: USA: FSA says has capacity for California pension bonds.
newsitem.headline: FSA says has capacity for California pension bonds.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said Monday it has remaining secondary market insurance capacity for the following four municipal issues:
--Contra Costa County, Calif., pension benefit obligation bonds.
--County of San Diego, Calif., pension obligation bonds, series A.
--Sonoma County, Calif., pension obligation bonds, series 1993.
Capacity, which is limited, is available first-come, first-served without limit per firm, FSA said.
For more information, call Tom Byrne at 212-826-0601.
